title: Mahatma Gourmet
description: Offers several options on a buffet with ten hot dishes specially prepared by their chef, using his knowledge of other cuisines such as Spanish, Japanese, French, Italian, Thai and others, to create the menu. Menu changes daily. Uses fresh ingredients and seasons with special herbs and spices. Always some vegan options.
streetAddress: 199 Professor Macedo Filho Street, Bom Retiro
